Test.Description:
Tests that the type of value stored into an array of type reference by an aastore instruction must be assignment with the component type of the array. Tries to store aastore04nInterface2 into the array of type aastore04nInterface. Interface aastore04nInterface does not implement aastore04nInterface2. (If S is an interface type: If T is an interface type, then T must be the same interface as S or a superinterface of S) Must throw VerifyError or runtime exception ArrayStoreException.
Covered assertions assert_class698
